author: Justin Wise
title: Fauci on Trump coronavirus comments: 'I can't jump in front of the microphone and push him down'
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, the director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, said in a new interview that he is working with the White House coronavirus task force to help ensure President Trump's remarks...
